screenshots.caption: Example of use and widget initial state

name: DHTML Widgets
short_description: dhtmlwidgets is a collection of DHTML Widgets including a calendar style date picker, div popups, an html SELECT combo box dropdown replacement that does not overlap other blocks, and other widgets.  Uses a PHP API (simple function calls)
